G A M E N O T E S

When Silvia is hunted by the person behind the attempted
murder she was assigned to commit, she knows the only
option remaining is to face the deadly conspirator
openly. In the heart of the local underworld, Silvia
will discover a game of power in which everyone is an
expendable pawn. A forced alliance with her ex-target
seems to be the only way to avoid the inevitable, but if
they want to dispel the secretive mists of the Vatican,
James and Silvia will have to come to terms with their
limitations

G R O U P N O T E S

We have enough money, beer, girls or whatever at the moment

Besides:

POSTMORTEM will not pre any updates
